step_zh: 准备盛满一氧化碳气体的储气瓶
step_en: Prepare a gas cylinder filled with carbon monoxide
clip_video_path: /path/to/chemistry/ch_67/video/02-一氧化碳的燃烧/02-一氧化碳的燃烧_step_1.mp4
subject: chemistry

annotations.safety_en: Must be operated in a fume hood. Check the airtightness of the setup before experiment. Carbon monoxide is flammable and highly toxic. Leakage may cause poisoning and explosion.
annotations.safety_zh: 必须在通风橱中操作，实验前需检查装置气密性。一氧化碳易燃且剧毒，泄漏可能导致中毒及爆炸

annotations.text: 这是一只盛满一氧化碳气体的储气瓶
annotations.text_en: This is a gas cylinder filled with carbon monoxide gas
